CHANGES
=======

0.2.3 (2014/08/05)
------------------

- unicode fix

0.2.2 (2014/08/05)
------------------

- TransformerXML API is now unicode-aware

------------------

- added TransformerXML API

0.2.0 (2014/03/16)
------------------

- enhanced resources_registry API 
- disabled Dropbox API due to Dropbox changes
- test fixes

0.1.0 (2013/07/11)
------------------

- initial release
